text.text: How can I mark diagnosis codes as favorites in ZOLL Billing, and what benefits does this provide?

text:
To mark a diagnosis code as a favorite in ZOLL Billing, follow these steps:

1. In the "Diagnosis Codes" list, click the "Favorites" column header to sort the codes by favorite status.
2. Click the "Star" icon to the left of the diagnosis code you want to mark as a favorite.
3. The diagnosis code will be added to the "Favorites" list.

You can also mark a diagnosis code as a favorite by clicking the "Add to Favorites" button in the "Diagnosis Codes" list.

Benefits of marking diagnosis codes as favorites:

* You can quickly access your favorite diagnosis codes from the "Favorites" list.
* You can use the "Favorites" list to create a custom list of diagnosis codes that you frequently use.
* You can share your "Favorites" list with other users.

text.text: Can you explain how using nicknames for diagnosis codes simplifies the process of assigning codes to claims?

text: When assigning diagnosis codes to claims, nicknames can be used to recall the code when assigning it to a claim. Nicknames can be letters or numbers but must be at least three characters in length. Favorites are identified by a star that appears next to the name. When assigning the code to a claim, the favorite will display at the top of the list.

text.text: What visual indicator distinguishes diagnosis codes marked as favorites?

text: Favorites are identified by a star that appears next to the name. When assigning the code to a claim, the favorite will display at the top of the list.

text: When assigning the code to a claim, the favorite will display at the top of the list.

text.text: Could you guide me through the process of using a diagnosis favorite when adding or changing a diagnosis code on a claim?

text: To use a diagnosis favorite when adding or changing a diagnosis code on a claim, you can follow these steps: 1. On the navigation bar, select **Settings**. 2. On the **Settings** page, click the **Diagnosis favorites** tab. 3. On the search field, enter a partial description or the ICD-10 code. As you type, a list appears. Select the code from the list. 4. The code displays under the search bar. Adding a nickname to the code is optional but if done, allows users to search for codes using the nickname when assigning codes to a claim.

text.text: Is it possible to import a list of diagnosis favorites from a CSV file in ZOLL Billing?

text:
Yes, it is possible to import a list of diagnosis favorites from a CSV file in ZOLL Billing. To do this, follow these steps:

1. Open the CSV file in a spreadsheet program.
2. Make sure that the first row of the file contains the column headers "Code", "Description", and "Nickname".
3. In the "Code" column, enter the ICD-10 code for each diagnosis favorite.
4. In the "Description" column, enter a description for each diagnosis favorite.
5. In the "Nickname" column, enter a nickname for each diagnosis favorite.
6. Save the CSV file.
7. In ZOLL Billing, go to the "Settings" page.
8. Click the "Diagnosis favorites" tab.
9. Click the "Import" button.
10. Browse to the CSV file that you saved in Step 6.
11. Click the "Open"

text:

text.text: How can I manually create a list of diagnosis favorites in ZOLL Billing?

text:
To manually create a list of diagnosis favorites in ZOLL Billing, follow these steps:

1. In the "Diagnosis Codes" list, click the "Favorites" column header to sort the codes by favorite status.
2. Click the "Star" icon to the left of the diagnosis code you want to mark as a favorite.
3. The diagnosis code will be added to the "Favorites" list.

You can also mark a diagnosis code as a favorite by clicking the "Add to Favorites" button in the "Diagnosis Codes" list.

text.text: Is it possible to edit the diagnosis favorites list after it has been created?

text:
Yes, it is possible to edit the diagnosis favorites list after it has been created. To do this, follow these steps:

1. In the "Settings" page, click the "Diagnosis favorites" tab.
2. Click the "Edit" button next to the diagnosis code you want to edit.
3. Make the necessary changes to the diagnosis code.
4. Click the "Save" button.

The diagnosis code will be updated in the "Diagnosis favorites" list.

text.text: What steps should I follow to delete a diagnosis favorite that was added by mistake?

text:
To delete a diagnosis favorite that was added by mistake, follow these steps:

1. In the "Settings" page, click the "Diagnosis favorites" tab.
2. Click the "Delete" button next to the diagnosis code you want to delete.
3. Click the "Yes" button to confirm the deletion.

The diagnosis code will be deleted from the "Diagnosis favorites" list.

text.text: Are there any limitations or restrictions on the use of nicknames for diagnosis codes?

text: Nicknames can be letters or numbers but must be at least three characters in length. Nicknames cannot contain a comma. The maximum file size is 3 MB. Duplicate favorites will be ignored.

text.text: How does ZOLL Billing handle duplicate favorites during the import process from a CSV file?

text: Duplicate favorites will be ignored during the import process from a CSV file.

text: The maximum file size allowed for importing diagnosis favorites is 3 MB.

You can also add a nickname to the code to allow users to search for codes using the nickname when assigning codes to a claim.
